original_text: And he went from year to year in circuit to Bethel, and Gilgal, and Mizpeh, and judged Israel in all those places.
korean_text: 해마다 벧엘과 길갈과 미스바로 순회하여 그 모든 곳에서 이스라엘을 다스렸고

sentences.original_text: And he went from year to year in circuit
to Bethel, and Gilgal, and Mizpeh,
and judged Israel in all those places.
